meta.title: Melody Mind - The Ultimate Music Quiz Game
meta.description: Test your music knowledge in our interactive quiz game. Answer questions about songs, artists, and music history from various genres including rock, pop, hip-hop, and classical.

about.title: About Melody Mind
about.description: Test your music knowledge across various categories. An exciting quiz game for music lovers of all genres.

intro: Step into the fascinating world of music! With Melody Mind, you can put your music knowledge to the test in exciting quiz rounds. Answer questions about songs from different decades, artists, albums, and music history. Collect points, earn golden records, and challenge other music enthusiasts. From rock to pop to hip-hop and classical - test your knowledge in your favorite genres. Start your musical quiz adventure now!

meta.title: Game Rules & Instructions - Melody Mind
meta.description: Learn the game rules of Melody Mind. Discover everything about game modes, scoring system, and bonus features in our music quiz.

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: Welcome to MelodyMind! Your goal is to answer questions about songs, artists, and albums from various music genres. Choose a genre and put your knowledge to the test. The more questions you answer correctly, the more points you'll earn.

difficultyLevels.title: Difficulty Levels
difficultyLevels.intro: There are three difficulty levels to choose from:

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: 10 questions per round. Perfect for refreshing your knowledge and having fun.

medium.title: Medium
medium.description: 15 questions per round. A challenge for advanced music lovers.

hard.title: Hard
hard.description: 20 questions per round. Only for true music experts!

titles.intro: Each difficulty level has its own title that you can unlock:

novice.title: Music Novice
novice.description: Answer all questions correctly in easy mode.

master.title: Music Master
master.description: Answer all questions correctly in medium mode.

legend.title: Music Legend
legend.description: Answer all questions correctly in hard mode.

goldenRecords.title: Golden Records
goldenRecords.intro: When you answer all questions correctly in a category, you'll earn a golden record:

rankings.title: Rankings
rankings.text: The ranking system compares you with other players. Your placement in the top 10 is based on your total points across all categories.
lists: Genre-specific Rankings: The best players in each genre.
Overall Rankings: Best players across all categories.

tipsAndTricks.title: Tips & Tricks
tips: Start with easy mode to get a feel for the game.
Play to your strengths and choose genres you're comfortable with.
Practice regularly to improve your score.
Accuracy over speed - read each question carefully.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Melody Mind
meta.description: Information about privacy at Melody Mind. Learn how we protect your data and what rights you have.

general.title: General Information
general.text: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy informs you about how we handle your data.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: We use cookies to provide you with the best possible user experience. These do not store any personally identifiable information.

serverLogs.title: Server Logs
serverLogs.text: For technical purposes, we automatically store server log files transmitted by your browser.

analytics.title: Analytics Data
analytics.text: We use anonymized analytics data to improve our gaming experience. This data includes game statistics, usage patterns, and performance data, but no personally identifiable information.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

list.information: Right to access your stored data

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about privacy, you can contact us at any time.

progress.title: Game Progress
progress.intro: The following game data is stored:
progress.purpose: This data is used exclusively to improve your gaming experience and display your achievements.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.intro: The following information is stored locally in your browser:
localStorage.storage: This data remains stored locally on your device and is not transferred to our servers. You can delete it at any time through your browser settings.

session.title: Session Data
session.intro: During an active game session, the following data is temporarily stored:

list.auth: Authentication status for the game session

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.intro: You have the right to have the following data deleted:

list.highscores: Your personal high scores and game statistics
list.account: Your entire user account and all associated data

deletion.local: Locally stored data (cookies, game progress) can be deleted independently through your browser settings.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR)
disputeResolution.additional: We are neither willing nor obligated to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

lawReference.title: Legal Notice
lawReference.text: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

jurisdiction.title: Legal Basis
jurisdiction.text: This website is subject to German law.
jurisdiction.applicableLaw: German law applies exclusively, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
jurisdiction.jurisdiction: The place of jurisdiction for all disputes arising from this contract is Germany, where legally permissible.
